entry.def: A pathogen is any organism which can cause disease in a person, animal, or plant.

means.word_mean: 1. any disease-producing agent (especially a virus or bacterium or other microorganism)

auth_sentence.content: The disease is caused by the fungus-like pathogen Phytophthora ramorum.
